resources.string: You are currently feeling nothing, tap here to add a feeling

You can write the trigger for this emotion or how you were able to solve it
Hmm, we\'re a little angry! The good news is in 2021 around 40%% of people around the world felt like this so you\'re not alone! And the even better news is you can definitely work on it.
Light up, you can get through this like you always do ðŸ˜Š. And your feelings are totally relatable by most people around the globe because at least 300 million people felt anxious in 2021.
Oh no, it must be really difficult feeling like this ðŸ˜”.

Remember we\'re here for you, here\'s the warmest hug just for you ðŸ¤—. According to WHO Depression is one of the leading causes of disability. Suicide is the fourth leading cause of death among 15-29-year-olds. You can use the latter link to access some useful data, however, depression is a serious matter, if you didn\'t feel better please counsel a doctor. My heart goes with you <3.
